name: Combine vs Aliens
description:
You are in the middle of a crop field and drive a combine that needs to harvest as much crop as possible.

But aliens are attacking both the field and the combine. Conveniently the combine is equipped with a turret that can shoot enemies using the harvested crop as AMMO.

How to play
  • Make the game full-screen!
  • Use the arrow keys to change the direction of the combine (the combine advances automatically and cannot be stopped)
  • Aim with the mouse and hold left-click to shoot
  • You get ammo by harvesting crop
  • Drive on the gems to get new types of shoot
Sources and license

The sources and license (The unlicense)  can be found here: https://github.com/jcornaz/bevy-jam-2
